Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Class that manages the match from outside. Creates the match using Users passed with the ServerClientConnections. Waits for ActionMessages to trigger internal Actions.

  • Method Details

    • getGameEngine

      public GameEngine getGameEngine()
      Returns the GameEngine
      Returns:
      the GameEngine

    • startGame

      public void startGame(boolean expertMode) throws InterruptedGameException
      Creates the players and the teams using the users present in the serverClientConnections map. Then the GameEngine is created with those teams. With the new GameEngine, the match is prepared using GameEngine start game method.
      Throws:
      InterruptedGameException - if an error was encountered during match creation.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame(int playerId, ActionMessage actionMessage) throws InterruptedGameException, IllegalGameActionException, WrongMessageContentException
      Method called when a message with an action command is received from the network. Runs the action through the GameEngine, passing actionMessage data. This method checks if the player has the turn and that the requested action is inside Round, else an error has been made by the client and must be warned.
      Parameters:
      actionMessage -
      Throws:
      InterruptedGameException
      IllegalGameActionException
      WrongMessageContentException

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection(String disconnectedUser)
      Interrupts the match and warns the client about the disconnection
      Parameters:
      disconnectedUser - the user that disconnected from the game.

    • interruptGame

      public void interruptGame(String playersMessage)
      Stops the game, warns all the players with a message and closes all the connections (if message is not null). Removes also the GameController from the active game controllers in the lobby (so the players in this game can play again).
      Parameters:
      playersMessage - if != null, is used as knowledge message to the user to specify why the match ended.

    • getServerClientConnections

      public Map<User,ServerClientConnection> getServerClientConnections()
      Gets the map of serverClientConnections.
      Returns:
      Map with Users and ServerClientConnections
